ing: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix
des: "This is a simple way to make ice cream with three ingredients. Pistachio is my favorite flavor, but any pudding flavor will do. I used skim milk with great results but am certain that fuller fat milk would result in an even creamier product."
ins: Mix sweetened condensed milk, milk, and pudding mix together in a bowl; transfer to an ice cream maker and process according to manufacturers' instructions.
